column1: Little is known about Khand or its people, other than that they were allied to Mordor.

The people of Khand and of [[Rhûn]] seemed to have been enemies on and off throughout the ages, but the [[Easterlings]] known as [[Wainriders]] passed south of Mordor and gathered with them Men of Khand and [[Haradrim]] of [[Near Harad]]; in {{TA

column1: Years later, Variags from Khand joined the forces of [[Sauron]] during the [[War of the Ring]].<ref name="Pelennor"/>
It is unknown if Khand was ever conquered by the [[Reunited Kingdom]] or if they remained independent. It is also unknown if Khand ever warred with the folk of the West after [[Sauron]]'s demise.
The meaning of ''Khand'' is unknown; it is, along with ''[[mûmak]]'' and ''[[Variag]]'', one of the few known words from the languages of the Men of the East and allies of Sauron.<ref>{{PM
